He quickly entered the small reception room with its sdll-un plastered wooden walls redo- lent of pine, and would have gone farther, but Ant6n ran ahead on tiptoe and knocked at a door. 
"Well, what is it?" came a sharp, unpleasant voice. 
"A visitor," answered Ant6n. 
"Ask him to wait," and the sound was heard of a chair being pushed back.
